# South Carolina Democratic Party - Elected Officials

## Congress

**James Clyburn** - Congressman, District 6

## State Senate Leadership

**Brad Hutto** - Democratic Leader, District 40
**Ronnie Sabb** - Deputy Minority Leader, District 32

## State Senate Members

- **Karl B. Allen** - District 7 (Greenville)
- **Tameika Isaac Devine** - District 19 (Richland)
- **Jeffrey Graham** - District 35 (Kershaw, Lee, Richland & Sumter)
- **Brad Hutto** - District 40 (Orangeburg, Barnwell & Bamberg)
- **Darrell Jackson** - District 21 (Richland)
- **Margie Bright Matthews** - District 45 (Multi-county)
- **Russell Ott** - District 26 (Calhoun, Lexington & Richland)
- **Ronnie A. Sabb** - District 32
- **Ed Sutton** - District 20 (Charleston)
- **Deon Tedder** - District 42 (Charleston & Dorchester)
- **Kent Williams** - District 30 (Multi-county)
- **Overture Walker** - District 22 (Richland)

## State House Leadership

**Todd Rutherford** - Democratic Leader, District 74
**Chandra Dillard** - Deputy Democratic Leader, District 23
**David Weeks** - Parliamentarian, District 51

## State House Members

- **Jerry N. Govan Jr.** - House District 95 (Orangeburg)
- **Joseph H. Jefferson Jr.** - House District 102 (Berkeley)
- **J. Todd Rutherford** - House District 74 (Richland) - incumbent
- **Chandra E. Dillard** - House District 23 (Greenville)
- **David Weeks** - House District 51 (Sumter)
- **John Richard King** - House District 49 (Spartanburg & York)
- **Terry Alexander** - House District 59 (Florence)
- **Carl Anderson** - House District 103 (Georgetown)
- **Justin T. Bamberg** - House District 90 (Bamberg)
- **Leon D. Howard** - House District 76 (Richland)
- **Wendy C. Brawley** - House District 70 (Richland)
- **Ivory T. Thigpen** - House District 79 (Richland)
